channel.title: Fizz Buzz on Abizer Nasir
channel.description: Recent content in Fizz Buzz on Abizer Nasir

item.title: FizzBuzz In Swift
item.description: Summary My NSLondon talk about the various approaches to the FizzBuzz problem in Swift, plus some thoughts on the new Language. My first mention in iOS Dev Weekly Slides The slides as a PDF file can be downloaded from here. You can see the slides on SpeakerDeck. Combined Download A zip file containing the slides and the playground is available here. Video The video of the talk can be seen at:
